hadiths.text: Narrated Ka`b bin 'Ujara:The Prophet (ﷺ) passed by me while I was kindling a fire under a (cooking) pot. He said, "Do the lice of your head trouble you?" I said, "Yes." So he called a barber to shave my head and ordered me to make expiation for that

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ الْمَرِيضِ إِنِّي وَجِعٌ أَوْ وَارَأْسَاهْ، أَوِ اشْتَدَّ بِي الْوَجَعُ
chapter.eng-name: To say "I am sick," or "Oh, my head!" or "My ailment has been aggravated"
